title: OpenClaw Initial Release
description: OpenClaw launches with groundbreaking features including memory search, plugin system, and multi-channel support.

title: Channels Architecture & Memory System
description: Major architectural shift: chat providers renamed to 'channels' with auto-migration. Memory system enhanced with vector search.

title: Web Tools & Browser Control
description: Introduction of web_search and web_fetch tools powered by Brave API, plus Chrome extension relay for browser automation.
highlights: Web search with Brave API integration

title: Security & Provider Auth
description: Enhanced security with provider auth registry, encrypted token storage, and improved remote CDP support.

title: Hooks System & Media Understanding
description: Revolutionary hooks system with bundled hooks and comprehensive media understanding (image/audio/video).

title: Control UI Refresh & ACP Integration
description: Major UI overhaul with enhanced TUI, memory tools, and ACP (Agent Communication Protocol) for IDE integrations.

title: Identity & Approval System
description: Custom assistant identities with avatars, exec approval system, and major cache optimizations.
highlights: Custom identity avatars in Control UI
Exec approval gates with elevated modes

title: Compaction Safeguard Enhancement
description: Adaptive chunking with progressive fallback for compaction, improving reliability.

title: TTS Core & HTTP Tools API
description: Text-to-speech moved to core with model-driven tags. New HTTP endpoint for direct tool invocation.

title: Ollama & LINE Support
description: Ollama discovery with documentation and LINE messaging API plugin.

title: OpenClaw Rebrand
description: Complete rebrand from Clawdbot to OpenClaw with strengthened security and gateway improvements.

title: CLI Completion & Build Optimization
description: Shell completion commands and faster TypeScript builds with tsdown/tsgo.
